segment.source: This section includes topics that describe how to perform specific tasks by using Windows® Assessment Services and Windows Assessment Services - Client (Windows ASC).
segment.target: This section includes topics that describe how to perform specific tasks by using Windows® Assessment Services and Windows Assessment Services - Client (Windows ASC).

segment.source: Prepare to deploy and assess a bare metal computer
segment.target: Prepare to deploy and assess a bare metal computer

segment.source: Prepare and add a bare metal computer to your Windows Assessment Services inventory.
segment.target: Prepare and add a bare metal computer to your Windows Assessment Services inventory.

segment.source: Create a project and job that includes the computer, and also the image and unattend answer file that are used to deploy an image to that computer before it is assessed.
segment.target: Create a project and job that includes the computer, and also the image and unattend answer file that are used to deploy an image to that computer before it is assessed.

segment.source: Add assets to Windows Assessment Services inventory
segment.target: Add assets to Windows Assessment Services inventory

segment.source: Add test computers, images and unattend answer files to inventory, and add out-of-box drivers to the driver store.
segment.target: Add test computers, images and unattend answer files to inventory, and add out-of-box drivers to the driver store.

segment.source: Deploy Windows using Windows Assessment Services
segment.target: Deploy Windows using Windows Assessment Services

segment.source: Assess computers that already have a supported, running operating system.
segment.target: Assess computers that already have a supported, running operating system.

segment.source: Deploy a supported operating system to a computer by using Windows Assessment Services, and then assess the computer.
segment.target: Deploy a supported operating system to a computer by using Windows Assessment Services, and then assess the computer.

segment.source: Or, use other deployment tools or methods to deploy a supported operating system to a computer, and then assess the computer.
segment.target: Or, use other deployment tools or methods to deploy a supported operating system to a computer, and then assess the computer.
